name: What happened at the Farm?
description:
This is just a Prototype Demo. It is a bit of a mess. But hope you will Enjoy anyway. There is no working Options menu yet. (You might encounter Fatal Error on pushing Play in the menu, I am not sure what is causing this, But you should be able to push past that with a few tries. Hope it will work.)

STORY:

You are out driving, and suddenly realize that you are out of gas, you stop at a remote farm house to see if they can help you with a bit of gas for your car.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Ctrl / C - Crouch

Shift - Run

E - Interact

Right Mouse - Zoom

Here is some links:

My YouTube Channel - https://www.youtube.com/c/MaxHorror

Any and all support is much appreciated!

My Patreon Page - https://www.patreon.com/MaxHorror
